notes: Brand new, unfurnished modern apartment in excellent condition with recessed lighting, central AC, and modern bathroom with glass shower enclosure. The unit is completely empty with clean white tiles and walls, multiple rooms visible including bedrooms and a balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows. For baby safety, the balcony has standard railings that would need childproofing, and the hard tile floors throughout could benefit from area rugs; no visible stairs or sharp corners. Good natural light from multiple windows.
